plugin.name: ðŸ—ƒ Summaries
plugin.description: Generate summaries from notes for a given time period, and save to notes. And save search results over all notes. Requires configuring to suit your use of NotePlan. Click link for more details and settings.
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark

plugin.commands.name: countsInPeriod
plugin.commands.description: Generate counts (and other stats) of tags and mentions for a time period

plugin.commands.name: weeklyStats
plugin.commands.description: Generate stats for tags and mentions for all weeks this year, and write CSV to a note

plugin.commands.name: occurrencesInPeriod
plugin.commands.description: Generate list of occurrences of specified tags or mentions for a time period

plugin.commands.name: saveSearchResults
plugin.commands.description: Save results from a search over all notes
